Chinese	Taiwanese	Sort	English
阿	a	a 01	initial particle, prefix to names of familiar people, as: A-beng... A-hoat... A-tho...
鴉	a	a 02	crow
亞	a	a 03	second, next to, inferior
或 ,亦	a2	a 04a	or (conjunction), introduces an alternative or a word that explains or means the same

你有沒有錢?	::Li2 u7 chi5* a2 bo5?	a 04c	Do you have money?
你要不要去?	::Li2 boeh khi3 a2 m7?	a 04d	Do you want to go?

不 ,不會	be7-verb-tit	be 07	expresses impossibility, equivalent to "not + verb + -able or -bile", The tone of the enclitic "tit" goes into the third tone and the verb before this enclitic does not change its tone. The affirmative is "e + verb + tit"

可, 能	e7-(verb)-tit	e 14	expresses possibility and is equivalent to the adjectival suffix "able" as in perishable or "ible" as in edible. The negative is "be+verb+tit". The tone of the enclitic "tit" changes to the third tone and the verb before this enclitic does not ch

如花似玉	ju5-hoa su7-gio8k	ju hoa su giok	like flower and jade (literal) -- (said of a girl) young, beautiful and pure
如法泡製	ju5-hoat pha3u-che3	ju hoat phau che	do things according to an approved routine methods, do something exactly as others have done

如入無人之境	ju5-ji8p bu5-ji5n chi ke2ng	ju jip bu jin chi keng	like walking into a no man's land, encounter little resistance (usually said of a victorious army)
如日東昇	ju5-ji8t tong-seng	ju jit tong seng	rising like the sun in the eastern sky (said of career, prospects)
越 ... 越 ,愈 ... 愈	ju2... ju2... (lu2... lu2... )	ju ju 01	the more... the more...

給 ,跟	ka7	ka 15	for, to, from, on. The Taiwanese have a little gimmick in regard to the use of this preposition "ka". The direct object of very many verbs can be placed before the verb and preceded by "ka"
要打你。	::Boeh ka7 li2 phah. Boeh phah li2.	ka 15a	I'll hit you.

不要替你做。不要幫你做。	::Bo5 a3i ka7 li2 cho3.	ka 15c	I won't do it for you.

你捨得讓他一個人去美國嗎?	::Hit e5 gi2n-a2 hiah se3-ha3n, li2 kam ho7+ i ka-ti7 chi8t e5 khi3 Bi2-kok, si7 bo5+?	kam 01b	That child is so small, are you willing to let him go to the States alone?
我這隻小貓捨不得給人。	::Go2a chit chiah niau-a2-ki2a* m7-kam ho7+ la5ng.	kam 01c	I am unwilling to give this kitten to somebody.
我的自行車被偷了 ,實在很捨不得。	::Go2a e5 thih-be2 ho7+ la5ng thau-khan khi3, chin m7-kam.	kam 01d	I got my bicycle stolen, I am still attached to it.

豈 ,難道	ka2m	kam 04	dare, presume, to venture. Is it possible that... (an initial interrogative particle which asks a question meant to be answered in the negative, thus equal to a strong affirmation of the opposite)
難道你不知道嗎?	::Li2 ka2m m7 chai-ia2*?	kam 04a	You certainly know, don't you? Is it possible that you don't know?
難道你沒錢嗎?	::Li2 ka2m bo5 chi5*?	kam 04b	You mean to tell me you have no money?
真的嗎?	::Ka2m a2n-ni?	kam 04c	How can it be?
難道你不去嗎?	::Li2 ka2m bo5 boeh khi3?	kam 04d	You certainly are going, aren't you?

我不知他在氣什麼 ,再怎麼叫也不回答。	::Go2a m7-chai i teh si7u-khi3 si2a*-ho3e, khah ki3o ia7 m7 i3n.	khah…ia m 01a	I don't know what he is angry about, no matter how much (often) I call him he does not answer.

人不照天理 ,天不照甲子 ,人心不古 ,世風日下。	La5ng bo5 chia3u thi*-li2, thi* bo5 chia3u kah-chi2.	lang bo 02	When man does not act according to reason, the heavens do not proceed according to the seasons ─ God punishes the excesses of man with droughts, floods
